name: Task Donegeon
lastChange: Added README.md with project overview and deployment instructions.
description: A gamified task and chore tracker for families and groups. Complete quests, earn currency and experience, and level up your character in a fun, medieval-themed adventure.
prompt: Please update the Readme file to explain what is going on for Github and put a version number and timestamp so I know the code I upload to github is the most recent.
